alert.note: Alert for Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 4:14AM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Blowing snow reducing visibility to near zero in areas. * WHERE...The lower Wood River foothills, including the towns of Hailey, Bellevue, and Picablo. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
